info.summary:
Giuseppe Pelagatti works as a Professor in Polytechnic University of Milan,Department of Electronics, Information and Bioengineering, and his\her h-index is 11, g-index is 20. His\Her interests are :
 Data Models; Distributed Database; Spatial Databases; Distributed System; Query Processing;
